lyrics_abstract:
Uh, hey dirty (What?)
Look at that girl right thurr (Oh)
She make me say

Oooh, oooh (Yeah)
Oooh, oooh (Hey)
Do what you do

I like the way you do that right thurr (Right thurr)
Swing your hips when you're walkin', let down your hurr (Let down your hurr)
I like the way you do that right thurr (Right thurr)
Lick your lips when you're talkin', that make me sturr

I like the way you look in them pants, shit, ya fine (Fine)
Lil momma a quarter piece, she far from a dime (Dime)
The type of girl that'll getcha' up and go make you grind (Grind)
I'm thinkin' about snatchin' her up, dirty, [...]
